query.default: select * from LocalActs_Reports_DocAppStatReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by Id

query.mssql: create table {0} ([Id] int NOT NULL, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [DocumentInfo] nvarchar(max), [PlanDate] nvarchar(max), [ActualDate] nvarchar(max), [Author] nvarchar(max), [Overdue] int, [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} ([Id] int NOT NULL, [Hyperlink] citext NOT NULL, [DocumentInfo] citext, [PlanDate] citext, [ActualDate] citext, [Author] citext, [Overdue] int, [ReportSessionId] citext NOT NULL)
